dsml:class.dsml:name: groupOfURLs
dsml:class.dsml:description: Dynamically Defined Group

dsml:class.dsml:name: extensibleObject
dsml:class.dsml:description: The extensibleObject object class, if present in an entry, permits that entry to optionally hold any attribute. The MAY attribute list of this class is implicitly the set of all attributes.

dsml:class.dsml:name: subschema
dsml:class.dsml:description: This object class is used in the subschema entry.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: credentialName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This is the credentialName attribute, which contains a name of a credential object.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: principalName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the principal name for which the mapping applies

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: objectClass
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The values of the objectClass attribute describe the kind of object which an entry represents. The objectClass attribute is present in every entry, with at least two values. One of the values is either "top" or "alias".

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: aliasedObjectName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The aliasedObjectName attribute is used by the directory service if the entry containing this attribute is an alias.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: knowledgeInformation
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is no longer used.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: cn
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This is the X.500 commonName attribute, which contains a name of an object. If the object corresponds to a person, it is typically the person's full name.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: sn
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This is the X.500 surname attribute, which contains the family name of a person.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: serialNumber
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the serial number of a device.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: c
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains a two-letter ISO 3166 country code (countryName).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: l
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the name of a locality, such as a city, county or other geographic region (localityName).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: st
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the full name of a state or province (stateOrProvinceName).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: street
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the physical address of the object to which the entry corresponds, such as an address for package delivery (streetAddress).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: o
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the name of an organization (organizationName).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: ou
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the name of an organizational unit (organizationalUnitName).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: title
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the title, such as "Vice President", of a person in their organizational context. The "personalTitle" attribute would be used for a person's title independent of their job function.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: description
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains a human-readable description of the object.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: searchGuide
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is for use by X.500 clients in constructing search filters. It is obsoleted by enhancedSearchGuide, described below in 5.48.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: businessCategory
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute describes the kind of business performed by an organization.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: registeredAddress
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds a postal address suitable for reception of telegrams or expedited documents, where it is necessary to have the recipient accept delivery.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: destinationIndicator
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used for the telegram service.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: presentationAddress
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains an OSI presentation address.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: supportedApplicationContext
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the identifiers of OSI application contexts.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: userCertificate
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'userCertificate;binary'.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: cACertificate
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'cACertificate;binary'.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: authorityRevocationList
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'authorityRevocationList;binary'.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: certificateRevocationList
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'certificateRevocationList;binary'.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: crossCertificatePair
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'crossCertificatePair;binary'.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The name attribute type is the attribute supertype from which string attribute types typically used for naming may be formed. It is unlikely that values of this type itself will occur in an entry. LDAP server implementations which do not support attribute subtyping need not recognize this attribute in requests. Client implementations MUST NOT assume that LDAP servers are capable of performing attribute subtyping.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: givenName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The givenName attribute is used to hold the part of a person's name which is not their surname nor middle name.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: initials
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The initials attribute contains the initials of some or all of an individuals names, but not the surname(s).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: generationQualifier
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The generationQualifier attribute contains the part of the name which typically is the suffix, as in "IIIrd".

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: x500UniqueIdentifier
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The x500UniqueIdentifier attribute is used to distinguish between objects when a distinguished name has been reused. This is a different attribute type from both the "uid" and "uniqueIdentifier" types.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: dnQualifier
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The dnQualifier attribute type specifies disambiguating information to add to the relative distinguished name of an entry. It is intended for use when merging data from multiple sources in order to prevent conflicts between entries which would otherwise have the same name. It is recommended that the value of the dnQualifier attribute be the same for all entries from a particular source.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: enhancedSearchGuide
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is for use by X.500 clients in constructing search filters.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: protocolInformation
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used in conjunction with the presentationAddress attribute, to provide additional information to the OSI network service.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: distinguishedName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute type is not used as the name of the object itself, but it is instead a base type from which attributes with DN syntax inherit. It is unlikely that values of this type itself will occur in an entry. LDAP server implementations which do not support attribute subtyping need not recognize this attribute in requests. Client implementations MUST NOT assume that LDAP servers are capable of performing attribute subtyping.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: houseIdentifier
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to identify a building within a location.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: supportedAlgorithms
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'supportedAlgorithms;binary'.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: deltaRevocationList
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is to be stored and requested in the binary form, as 'deltaRevocationList;binary'.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: dmdName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The value of this attribute specifies a directory management domain (DMD), the administrative authority which operates the directory server.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: createTimestamp
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute SHOULD appear in entries which were created using the Add operation.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: modifyTimestamp
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute SHOULD appear in entries which have been modified using the Modify operation.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: creatorsName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute SHOULD appear in entries which were created using the Add operation.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: modifiersName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute SHOULD appear in entries which have been modified using the Modify operation.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: subschemaSubentry
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The value of this attribute is the name of a subschema entry (or subentry if the server is based on X.500(93)) in which the server makes available attributes specifying the schema.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: attributeTypes
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is typically located in the subschema entry.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: objectClasses
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is typically located in the subschema entry.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: matchingRules
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is typically located in the subschema entry.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: matchingRuleUse
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is typically located in the subschema entry.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: namingContexts
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The values of this attribute correspond to naming contexts which this server masters or shadows. If the server does not master any information (e.g. it is an LDAP gateway to a public X.500 directory) this attribute will be absent. If the server believes it contains the entire directory, the attribute will have a single value, and that value will be the empty string (indicating the null DN of the root). This attribute will allow a client to choose suitable base objects for searching when it has contacted a server.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: altServer
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The values of this attribute are URLs of other servers which may be contacted when this server becomes unavailable. If the server does not know of any other servers which could be used this attribute will be absent. Clients may cache this information in case their preferred LDAP server later becomes unavailable.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: supportedExtension
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The values of this attribute are OBJECT IDENTIFIERs identifying the supported extended operations which the server supports. If the server does not support any extensions this attribute will be absent.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: supportedControl
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The values of this attribute are the OBJECT IDENTIFIERs identifying controls which the server supports. If the server does not support any controls, this attribute will be absent.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: supportedSASLMechanisms
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The values of this attribute are the names of supported SASL mechanisms which the server supports. If the server does not support any mechanisms this attribute will be absent.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: supportedLDAPVersion
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The values of this attribute are the versions of the LDAP protocol which the server implements.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: ldapSyntaxes
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Servers MAY use this attribute to list the syntaxes which are implemented. Each value corresponds to one syntax.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: credentialMapRef
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the dn string for the credential to which a mapping applies

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: principalPassword
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the eis password for a user-password credential

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: resourceName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the resource name for which the mapping applies

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: applicationName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the application-name for the resource to which a mapping applies

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: resourceName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the module name for which the mapping applies

dsml:class.dsml:name: wlsUser
dsml:class.dsml:description: This auxiliary class allows WLS to use dynamic groups by adding WLS specific attributes to inetOrgPerson objects.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: orclTimeZone
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains time zone ID of user.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: im
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains IM address of user.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsMemberOf
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the distinguised names of groups to which the user belongs.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCreatorInfo
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute contains the component that created or deployed this policy, role, or credential map.

dsml:class.dsml:name: EResource
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for WLS to define Dynamic Authorization / Entitlement Policy for a given Resource.

dsml:class.dsml:name: ERole
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for WLS to define Dynamic ROLE Policy Definition.

dsml:class.dsml:name: EPredicate
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for WLS to register PREDICATE -- java class name.

dsml:class.dsml:name: EProfile
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for WLS to define user profile.

dsml:class.dsml:name: EProperty
dsml:class.dsml:description: This holds the user profile's property.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: EExpr
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the Policy Definition in binary form.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: EPfID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the Profile Instance ID.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: EPfType
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the Profile's Property type.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: EPfValid
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the Valid Value(s) of Profile Property.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: EAux
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the Policy Expression in string form.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: EPfValue
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the VALUE (or default value) of Profile Property.

dsml:class.dsml:name: wlsCertRegEntry
dsml:class.dsml:description: This class holds an entry in the certificate registry.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCertRegSubjectDN
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This required attribute holds a string containing the subject DN of a certificate registered in the certificate registry in RFC2253 format, sorted alphabetically by type.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCertRegIssuerDN
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This required attribute holds a string containing the issuer DN of a certificate registered in the certificate registry in RFC2253 format, sorted alphabetically by type.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCertRegSerialNumber
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This required attribute holds a string containing the serial number of a certificate registered in the certificate registry in RFC2253 format, sorted alphabetically by type. A string was used instead of an int since serial numbers are big integers.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCertRegSerialNumber
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This optional attribute holds a base64 encoded byte array containing the subject key identifier of a certificate registered in the certificate registry.

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Business-Entity
dsml:class.dsml:description: Business Entity object

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Business-Service
dsml:class.dsml:description: Business Service object

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Binding-Template
dsml:class.dsml:description: Binding Template object

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-tModel
dsml:class.dsml:description: tModel object

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Publisher-Assertion
dsml:class.dsml:description: Publisher Assertion object

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Discovery-URL
dsml:class.dsml:description: Discovery URL

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Contact
dsml:class.dsml:description: Contact Information

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Address
dsml:class.dsml:description: Address information for a contact entry

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Keyed-Reference
dsml:class.dsml:description: KeyedReference

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-tModel-Instance-Info
dsml:class.dsml:description: tModelInstanceInfo

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Instance-Details
dsml:class.dsml:description: instanceDetails

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Overview-Doc
dsml:class.dsml:description: overviewDoc

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Ref-Object
dsml:class.dsml:description: an object class conatins a reference to another entry

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-Ref-Auxiliary-Object
dsml:class.dsml:description: an auxiliary type object used in another structural class to hold a reference to a third entry

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-ou-container
dsml:class.dsml:description: an organizational unit with uddi attributes

dsml:class.dsml:name: uddi-User
dsml:class.dsml:description: A User with UDDI attributes

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Business-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Business Key

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-user-language
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: User language

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-user-quota-entity
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: User entity quota

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-user-quota-service
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: User service quota

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-user-quota-binding
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: User binding quota

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-user-quota-tmodel
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: User tmodel quota

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-user-quota-assertion
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: User publisher asserion quota

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-user-quota-messagesize
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: User message size quota

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-tModel-origin
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: tModel origin

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-tModel-type
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: tModel type

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-tModel-checked
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: tModel checked or not

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Authorized-Name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Authorized Name for publisher of data

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Operator
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Name of UDDI Registry Operator

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Business Entity Name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Name-Soundex
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Name in soundex format

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Description
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Description of Business Entity

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Use-Type
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Name of convention that the referenced document follows

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-URL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: URL

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Person-Name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Name of Contact Person

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Phone
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Telephone Number

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Email
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Email address

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Sort-Code
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Code to sort addresses

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-tModel-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Key to reference a tModel entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Address-Line
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Actual address lines in free form text

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Service-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Service Key

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Service-Name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Service Name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Binding-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Binding Key

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Access-Point
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: A text field to convey the entry point address for calling a web service

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Hosting-Redirector
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Provides a Binding Key attribute to redirect reference to a different binding template

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Instance-Parms
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Parameters to use a specific facet of a bindingTemplate description

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Overview-URL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: URL reference to a long form of an overview document

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-From-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique key reference to first businessEntity assertion is made for

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-To-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique key reference to second businessEntity assertion is made for

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Key-Name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: An attribute of the KeyedReference structure

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Key-Value
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: An attribute of the KeyedReference structure

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Auth-Info
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Authorization information

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Ref-Keyed-Reference
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: reference to a keyedReference entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Ref-Category-Bag
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: reference to a categoryBag entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Ref-Identifier-Bag
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: reference to a identifierBag entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Ref-TModel
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: reference to a TModel entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Contact-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Discovery-URL-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Address-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Overview-Doc-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Instance-Details-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-tModel-Instance-Info-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Publisher-Assertions-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Keyed-Reference-ID
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unique ID which will serve as the Distinguished Name of each entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Ref-Attribute
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: a reference to another entry

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Entity-Name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Business entity Name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-tModel-Name
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: tModel Name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-tMII-TModel-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: tModel key referneced in tModelInstanceInfo

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Keyed-Reference-TModel-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: tModel key referneced in KeyedReference

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Address-tModel-Key
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: tModel key referneced in Address

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-isHidden
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: a flag to indicate whether an entry is hidden

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-Time-Stamp
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: modification time satmp

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-next-id
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: generic counter

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: uddi-var
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: generic variable

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: principalNameIsUser
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold information about whether the principal is a username or a group name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: credentialAction
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold information about credential action for the mapping

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: keyaliasName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the keystore alias

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: keystoreAliasPassword
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute is used to hold the password to the key pair entry in the keystore

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsXmlFragment
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds XML fragments.

dsml:class.dsml:name: xacmlEntry
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for policies and policy sets expressed in XACML syntax.

dsml:class.dsml:name: xacmlAuthorizationPolicy
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for authorization policy expressed in XACML syntax.

dsml:class.dsml:name: xacmlRoleAssignmentPolicy
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for role assignment policy expressed in XACML syntax.

dsml:class.dsml:name: xacmlResourceScoping
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for authorization or role assignment policies to specify as an optimization that they can only apply at or below a level of the resource hierarchy.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: xacmlDocument
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the XACML document.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: xacmlStatus
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the status of the XACML entry. One of active (0), if referenced (1), inactive (2), or entitlement (3).

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: xacmlVersion
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the version number for a policy or policy set.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: xacmlRole
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds role target of a role assignment policy.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: xacmlResourceScope
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds resource scope for a given XACML authorization or role assignment policy.

dsml:class.dsml:name: wlsPolicyCollectionInfo
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for policy collection information.

dsml:class.dsml:name: wlsRoleCollectionInfo
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for role collection information.

dsml:class.dsml:name: wlsCredMapCollectionInfo
dsml:class.dsml:description: This is for credential map collection information.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCollectionName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the policy, role or cred map collection name.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCollectionVersion
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the policy, role or cred map collection version.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: wlsCollectionTimestamp
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: This attribute holds the policy, role or cred map collection timestamp.

dsml:class.dsml:name: beaSAMLPartner
dsml:class.dsml:description: Abstract class representing a SAML partner. Root OID for SAML-related objects/attributes is 1.3.6.1.4.1.4602.3.2.31.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLPartnerEnabled
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating whether this SAML Partner entry is enabled or disabled.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLPartnerDescription
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Description for a SAML Partner entry.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLTargetURL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's configured Target URL.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLProfile
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The SAML Profile used for this partner.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLIssuerURI
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's SAML Issuer URI.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLSourceId
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's SAML Source ID.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLIntersiteTransferURL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's SAML Intersite Transfer URL.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAssertionConsumerURL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's SAML Assertion Consumer URL.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAssertionRetrievalURL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's SAML Assertion Retrieval URL.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLRedirectURIs
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Unauthenticated users accessing these URIs are redirected to the partner's ITS URL.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLPostForm
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The POST form to use with Browser/POST Profile.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAudienceURI
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The SAML Audience URI for this partner's assertions.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAuthUsername
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Username for authentication to SAML responder.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAuthPassword
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Password for authentication to SAML responder.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAuthSSLClientCertAlias
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's SSL client certificate.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLTimeToLive
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Time-to-live for this partner's assertions, in seconds. Added to the assertion's NotBefore time to arrive at the NotOnOrAfter time.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLTimeToLiveOffset
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Positive or negative number of seconds used to compensate for clock skew between asserting party and relying party. The delta value is added to the current time to arrive at the NotBefore time for an assertion. Does not affect time-to-live, as the delta is applied before calculating NotOnOrAfter.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLDoNotCacheCondition
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating whether a DoNotCache condition should be added to assertion.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAssertionSigned
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating whether this partner's assertions are signed.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLSigKeyinfoIncluded
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating whether signed assertions should include a keyinfo element.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAssertionSigningCertAlias
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's assertion signing certificate.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLProtocolSigningCertAlias
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The partner's protocol element signing certificate.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLNameMapperClass
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: The Name Mapper class to use for this partner.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLGroupsAttributeEnabled
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating whether processing of user groups as AttributeStatements is enabled or disabled.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLVirtualUserEnabled
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating whether authentication of virtual users is enabled or disabled.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLIntersiteTransferParams
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Parameters that should be sent to the partner's ITS on redirect.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLAssertionConsumerParams
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Parameters that should be sent to the partner's ACS on redirect/POST.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAMLPersistentARSConnEnabled
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating whether persistent ARS connections are enabled for this partner.

dsml:class.dsml:name: beaSAML2Partner
dsml:class.dsml:description: Abstract class representing a SAML 2.0 partner. Root OID for SAML 2.0-related objects/attributes is 1.3.6.1.4.1.4602.3.2.32.

dsml:class.dsml:name: beaSAML2SPPartner
dsml:class.dsml:description: Class representing a SAML 2.0 service provider partner.

dsml:class.dsml:name: beaSAML2IdPPartner
dsml:class.dsml:description: Class representing a SAML 2.0 identity provider partner.

dsml:class.dsml:name: beaSAML2Endpoint
dsml:class.dsml:description: Class representing a SAML 2.0 service endpoint.

dsml:class.dsml:name: beaSAML2Cache
dsml:class.dsml:description: Class representing SAML 2.0 backend storage based cache model.

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerAudienceURIs
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner audience URI

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerDescription
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner description

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerType
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner type

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerEnabled
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Boolean value indicating if partner is enabled

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerEntityId
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner entity Id

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerContactPersonCompany
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner contact person company

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerContactPersonEmailAddress
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner contact person e-mail address

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerContactPersonGivenName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner contact person given name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerContactPersonSurName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner contact person surname

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerContactPersonTelephoneNumber
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner contact person telephone number

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerContactPersonType
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner contact person type

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerIssuerURI
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner issuer URI

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerErrorURL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner error URL

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerOrganizationName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner organization name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerOrganizationURL
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner organization URL

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerSigningCert
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner signing certificate

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerConfirmationMethod
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner confirmation method

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerServices
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner service endpoints

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerArtifactBindingUsePOST
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner artifact binding use POST flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerArtifactBindingPOSTForm
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner artifact binding POST form

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerWantArtifactRequestSigned
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner want artifact requests signed flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerPOSTBindingPOSTForm
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner POST binding POST form

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerClientPasswordEncrypt
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner encrypted client password

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerClientUserName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner client user name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerTransportLayerClientCert
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner TLS client certificate

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerClientPasswordSet
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner client password set flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerNameMapperClassName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner name-mapper class name

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerTimeToLive
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner assertion time-to-live

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerTimeToLiveOffset
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner assertion time-to-live offset

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerIncludeOneTimeUseCondition
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner include one-time use condition flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerGenerateAttributes
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner generate attributes flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerWantAssertionSigned
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner want assertion signed flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerKeyInfoIncluded
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner key info included

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerWantAuthnRequestsSigned
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner want authentication request signed flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerVirtualUserEnabled
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner virtual user enabled flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerProcessAttributes
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner process attributes flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2PartnerRedirectURIs
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Partner redirect URI

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2EndpointBindingLocation
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Endpoint binding location

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2EndpointBindingType
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Endpoint binding type

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2EndpointServiceType
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Endpoint service type

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2EndpointIndex
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Endpoint index

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2EndpointDefault
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Endpoint is default flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2EndpointDefaultSet
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: Endpoint is default flag

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2CacheName
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: name of a cache instance

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2CacheKey
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: key associated with cached item

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2CacheValue
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: the binary format of cached object

dsml:attribute-type.dsml:name: beaSAML2CacheExpirationTime
dsml:attribute-type.dsml:description: expiration time of cached object, in milli seconds
